titles.title: Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2015

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the temporary increase in number of judges presiding over the United States Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims, and for other purposes.
Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 114-242.

bill.summary:
Veterans Court of Appeals Support Act of 2015
This bills makes permanent the maximum number of judges presiding over the Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims to nine judges.
